resources.string: Note: If you have no screen lock, Android refuses to store the security settings!
This small helper app creates a wlan connection entry for the Selfnet WLAN network. It configures the correct SSL CA and subject name match, making it a little more secure than a hand-created entry.
If you face any issues connecting to the WLAN please check whether you typed in your password and email address correctly.\nIf this doesn\'t help contact support@selfnet.de.
